Experiences.Subject: "Yinxin" — Provably Secure Covert Communication Technology in Uncontrolled Network Environment
Experiences.Type: College Students' Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Program
Experiences.Introduction: This project proposes a linguistic steganography method based on a large language model, designs a provably secure covert parameter exchange and identity authentication protocol in a public network environment, and develops a covert communication application which is resistant to statistical analysis in the social network.
Experiences.Contributions: Designing communication protocols and implementing client programs.
Experiences.Supervisor: Assoc. Prof. Zhongliang Yang (杨忠良) of BUPT

Experiences.Subject: Design and Implementation of Accleration Algorithm for Erasure-Correcting Codes of Distributed Storage
Experiences.Type: Provincial College Students' Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Program
Experiences.Introduction: This project investigates and analyzes acceleration schemes of erasure-correcting coding in current storage systems, and accelerates the encoding and decoding process of important distributed storage coding algorithms, thus improving its data throughput in practical applications.
Experiences.Contributions: Merging accelerated algorithms for encoding and decoding and testing performance.
Experiences.Supervisor: Assoc. Prof. Jie Hao (郝杰) of BUPT

Experiences.Subject: Intelligent Monitoring System of Shop Flow
Experiences.Type: The second prize of the 7th "Chuyan Project" of BUPT
Experiences.Introduction: This project designs and implements an intelligent monitoring system of shop flow, which can provide real-time statistics of the number of people in the shop, and can be used for monitoring and management of the shop.
Experiences.Supervisor: Assoc. Prof. Weihai Li (李巍海) of BUPT

Experiences.Subject: Kinect-Based Interactive Sports Teaching Platform
Experiences.Type: The third prize of the 6th "Chuyan Project" of BUPT
Experiences.Introduction: This project designs and implements a Kinect-based interactive sports teaching platform, which can provide real-time feedback on the user's movements and gestures, and can be used for teaching and training in sports.
Experiences.Contributions: Designing gesture comparison algorithms and implementing client programs.
Experiences.Supervisor: Assoc. Prof. Guosheng Xu (徐国胜) of BUPT
